SEARCH
Package org.opensearch.sdk

Class BaseExtension

java.lang.Object
org.opensearch.sdk.BaseExtension
All Implemented Interfaces:
Extension
Direct Known Subclasses:
HelloWorldExtension, TestBaseExtension.TestExtension, TestSDKActionModule.TestActionExtension
public abstract class BaseExtension extends Object implements Extension
An abstract class that simplifies extension initialization and provides an instance of the runner.
